trans-unit.source: The mobile app project lets you to run your new mobile app backend locally.
trans-unit.target: The mobile app project lets you to run your new mobile app backend locally.

trans-unit.source: This makes it easy to debug your service code before you even publish it to Azure.
trans-unit.target: This makes it easy to debug your service code before you even publish it to Azure.

trans-unit.source: On your Windows PC, extract project you downloaded earlier, and then open it in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: On your Windows PC, extract project you downloaded earlier, and then open it in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Select the bottom project which should be your Mobile App name with Service at the end of it.
trans-unit.target: Select the bottom project which should be your Mobile App name with Service at the end of it.

trans-unit.source: Press **CTRL-F5** to download the nuget packages, build the project and start the mobile app backend locally.
trans-unit.target: Press **CTRL-F5** to download the nuget packages, build the project and start the mobile app backend locally.

trans-unit.source: When you run your mobile app client, pointed at localhost, it will talk to your local backend.
trans-unit.target: When you run your mobile app client, pointed at localhost, it will talk to your local backend.
